resources.string: Loading, this could take up to 5 minutes.
Click here for the latest version
Telegram Chat Link -> Bugs / Questions / etc.
Open deezLoader in an external browser

FAQ:
 Q) The login button doesn't work. 
 A) The known fixes are: 
 	1) Use a vpn to login
 	2) Click that goddamn button too many times until it shows 'Loggin in'

 Q) Downloads doesn't start. FIX
 A) Follow the steps (That's the only known fix): 
 	1) In the internal memory, delete the Deezloader Remix folder.
 	2) Uninstall deezerloader
 	3) Reinstall deezloader.
